changeSet.sql: create table if not exists store ( id bigserial primary key, created_at timestamp without time zone not null default now(), login varchar(255) not null unique, password varchar(255) not null unique, full_name varchar(255) not null unique, phone_number varchar(20) not null, email varchar(255) not null, address varchar(255) not null, link varchar(255) not null, is_active boolean not null default true );
